<pre class="code_text"><span class="num">3</span><span class="text"><span class="puple"><span class="blue">.skip_nav a <span class="white">{</span></span> display:</span><span class="puple"> block; position:</span><span class="puple"> fixed; left:</span><span class="puple"> 0; z-index:</span><span class="puple"> 3; top:</span><span class="puple"> -1000px; width:</span><span class="puple"> 100%; line-height:</span><span class="puple"> 40px; text-align:</span><span class="puple"> center; font-size:</span><span class="puple"> 14px; background-color:</span><span class="puple"> #385170; color:</span> #fff; }
</span></pre>

<pre class="code_text"><span class="num">54</span><span class="text"><span class="puple"><span class="blue">#gnb &gt; ul &gt; li &gt; a:</span><span class="puple">first-child <span class="white">{</span></span> padding-left:</span><span class="puple"> 0; margin-left:</span> 0; }
</span></pre>
<pre class="code_text"><span class="num">55</span><span class="text"><span class="puple"><span class="blue"><span class="blue">#gnb &gt; ul &gt; li:</span><span class="puple">nth-child(6n+1) &gt; a<span class="white">,</span></span> #gnb &gt; ul &gt; li:</span><span class="puple">nth-child(7n+1) &gt; a <span class="white">{</span></span> color:</span> #cc1a3f; }
</span></pre>
<pre class="code_text"><span class="num">56</span><span class="text"><span class="puple"><span class="blue">#gnb ul ul <span class="white">{</span></span> position:</span><span class="puple"> absolute; left:</span><span class="puple"> 0; padding:</span><span class="puple"> 30px 0; width:</span> 100%; }
</span></pre>
